title: Service Account Credential Management
description: An analyst must onboard a new application's service account into the PAM tool to enable automatic password rotation.

tasks.description: Create a new service account in Active Directory for the application.
Onboard the new service account into the PAM tool, configuring it for monthly password rotation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully adds the account to the PAM system with the correct policy.

tasks.description: Provide the application owner with the details needed to query the PAM tool for the service account's current password via API.
tasks.expected_outcome: The application is successfully configured to use the PAM-managed credential.
